title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I don't understand the bug description.
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), the bug does something unexpected.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars, but instead I get the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant''.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, perform the following steps:
1. Open a binary project.
2. Select the org.apache.ant package.
3. Press the F4 key.
